Tsurune
              Episode 3            – Just as They Met
paragraph:
When Minato finally joins the Kazemai Kyudo Club, most of the boys accept him immediately. Kaito alone holds a grudge              
           over Minato's wishy-washy behavior. Minato tries to smooth things over, but...
